price: Ni We Munyembaraga z’ikirenga ku bagaragu be, kandi ni We Nyirubugenge buhambaye, Uzi byose.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-khabīru
